works.name: EMCOMED
works.position: Network and Server Administrator | Application Development
works.description: Worked for 7 years as a network and server administrator in Linux and Windows environments, managing a segmented infrastructure with over 100 users. During this time, I actively contributed to the development of business tools and applications using technologies such as PHP, ExpressJS, jQuery, and React, integrated with MSSQL and MySQL databases. My experience includes optimizing server performance, implementing efficient data management solutions, and automating processes.

works.name: DSPOT
works.description: Here I started using TypeScript, I also strengthened my skills in design and the application of styles with CSS and Sass. I had the opportunity to participate in the development of applications with a high level of design, which has been very enriching. Additionally, I incorporated Figma as a tool for application development, which has allowed me to streamline my workflow and create more effective designs.

works.name: TETRAIMPACT
works.description: Currently, I am part of this company, where I have participated in various software development projects, designing and implementing efficient and scalable solutions. I work with modern technologies such as NextJS, Material UI, Jest, Vitest, Remix, and Prisma ORM, focusing on creating intuitive interfaces, optimizing frontend performance, and ensuring efficient database integration. My experience includes process optimization, implementing automated tests, and developing robust applications with a modular architecture.

jobs.name: camon
jobs.description: I designed and developed a landing page for CAMON Global Services, focusing on performance, SEO, accessibility, and a seamless user experience. I implemented technologies such as NextJS, Taildwind, and image optimization, ensuring fast load times and compatibility across multiple devices.

jobs.name: f-resources
jobs.description: Page listing some of the pages with resources for development, design and documentation for the community of web developers and designers.
